tables.name: airline_id_to_name
tables.description: Table mapping airline IDs to their corresponding airline names.

columns.name: airline_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each airline.

columns.name: airline_name
columns.description: The name of the airline corresponding to the given ID.

tables.name: flight_bookings
tables.description: This table contains information about flight bookings, including details about flights, passengers, and additional services.

columns.name: airline_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the airline.

columns.name: flight_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the flight.

columns.name: departure_datetime
columns.description: Date and time when the flight departs.

columns.name: arrival_datetime
columns.description: Date and time when the flight arrives.

columns.name: departure_time
columns.description: Time when the flight departs.

columns.name: arrival_time
columns.description: Time when the flight arrives.

columns.name: booking_code
columns.description: Unique code for the booking.

columns.name: passenger_name
columns.description: Name of the passenger.

columns.name: seat_number
columns.description: The assigned seat number for the passenger.

columns.name: travel_class
columns.description: Class of service for the flight (e.g., Economy, Business, First).

columns.name: fare
columns.description: Cost of the ticket in a monetary value.

columns.name: extras
columns.description: Additional services booked by the passenger (e.g., Extra Baggage, Meal, No Extras).

columns.name: loyalty_points
columns.description: Points earned by the passenger through loyalty programs.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the booking (e.g., Confirmed, Cancelled, Pending).

columns.name: gate
columns.description: The gate number from which the flight departs.

columns.name: terminal
columns.description: The terminal of departure.

columns.name: baggage_claim
columns.description: The baggage claim area for the flight.

columns.name: duration_hours
columns.description: Duration of the flight in hours.

columns.name: layover_count
columns.description: Number of layovers during the flight.

columns.name: layover_locations
columns.description: Locations of layovers for the flight.

columns.name: aircraft_type
columns.description: Type of aircraft used for the flight.

columns.name: pilot
columns.description: Name or identifier of the pilot.

columns.name: cabin_crew
columns.description: Name or identifier of the cabin crew team.

columns.name: inflight_entertainment
columns.description: Indicates if inflight entertainment is available (Yes or No).

columns.name: meal_option
columns.description: Meal option selected by the passenger (e.g., Vegan, Vegetarian, Non-Vegetarian, No Meal).

columns.name: wifi_available
columns.description: Indicates if WiFi is available during the flight (Available or Not Available).

columns.name: window_seat
columns.description: Indicates if the seat is at the window.

columns.name: aisle_seat
columns.description: Indicates if the seat is at the aisle.

columns.name: emergency_exit_row
columns.description: Indicates if the seat is in an emergency exit row.

columns.name: number_of_stops
columns.description: Total number of stops during the flight.

columns.name: reward_program_member
columns.description: Indicates if the passenger is a member of a reward program (Yes or No).
